if.test: category != null and category != '' and category != '전체보기'

choose.when: order by hit desc, fnum desc
order by camout desc, fnum desc

mapper.update: update funding set title=#{title},content=#{content},amount=#{amount},camout=#{camout}, sdate=#{sdate},edate=#{edate},category=#{category},confirm=#{confirm},aid=#{aid}, addr=#{addr},id=#{id} where fnum = #{fnum}
mapper.select:
select * from funding where sdate > sysdate and edate > sysdate
order by fnum desc

select * from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate < sysdate
order by fnum desc

choose.when:
select * from ( select * from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate )aa,( select (edate-sysdate)cal, fnum from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate )bb where aa.fnum = bb.fnum
order by cal asc
choose.otherwise: select * from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate

mapper.select: select * from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate and (edate-sysdate) = (select min(edate-sysdate) from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate)
select * from funding where sdate > sysdate and edate > sysdate and (sysdate - sdate) = (select max(sysdate - sdate) fnum from funding where sdate > sysdate and edate > sysdate)

select * from ( select aa.*, rownum rnum from ( select * from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate order by fnum desc )aa where hit = (select max(hit) from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate) ) where rnum = 1

select * from ( select aa.*, rownum rnum from ( select * from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate order by fnum desc )aa where camout = (select max(camout) from funding where sdate < sysdate and edate > sysdate) ) where rnum = 1
